events.name: Code
events.description: Ramp up your front end skills as our speakers and panelists drop knowledge with talks and workshops on the latest trends in front end. Revel in the live code examples and thoughtful conversations.

events.name: Community
events.description: Connect and network with like-minded professionals in the industry. Leverage Fore_Front’s inclusive atmosphere to build friendships and mentorships.

events.name: Coffee
events.description: But first, coffee. You bring the enthusiasm, we’ll provide bagels and caffeine.

events.name: We’re Looking For Rockstar Speakers
events.speaker: You!
events.description: Are you at the forefront of front end technologies? Do Progressive Web Apps make your heart sing? Does CSS hold no secrets for you? Is accessibility a driving force of your coding practices? Fore_Front is looking for rockstar front end developers from the community to speak at our upcoming events. Submit a talk proposal or workshop idea.
